body_html:
There is no official support for AMD GPUs yet.
And tf-nightly-gpu definitely cannot use OpenCL yet.
You will need to reach out to AMD if you are using ROCm, or Codeplay if you are using opencl.
body_text:
There is no official support for AMD GPUs yet.
And tf-nightly-gpu definitely cannot use OpenCL yet.
You will need to reach out to AMD if you are using ROCm, or Codeplay if you are using opencl.
body:
There is no official support for AMD GPUs yet.
And `tf-nightly-gpu` definitely cannot use OpenCL yet.
You will need to reach out to AMD if you are using ROCm, or Codeplay if you are using opencl.
